Infectum.turoyo: Ap pallat da ilonekokәmdi/kokaymibusaṯwo. Leaves become black in winter. (İlyas p.c)

Preterit.turoyo: luḥuldogrәšleu+šrulo, ŭ mi+šәmšodu+qayṭokamәdʕalḥḏoḏeomar, ‘U+medawo, dloeluxxlәqlux, dlo+taʕibatebesәmlux, bnaqladhawi ŭ hne, kamәdʕalḥḏode, komәqḥorat mine?
translations: ‘Talpidae removed the melon's foliage, and it
he says, ‘That thing, that you did not create, on that you did not weary yourself, you did not do, that appeared in one moment and whatsited,
together, are you angry about it? (254 Jonah)
